column5: I joined this board I think about 3 or 4 years ago. I have had the pleasure of helping some folks here with their job interview questions, their resume, job searches and what not... but I still feel to this day that I get way more back from the good folks here, then I can possibly ever pay back. I just wanted to say thanks to all who made the effort to help me out on my plumbing problem, but also to everyone whether we've connect in person, through PM's or what ever, for making this such a great place to spend time. I hope I can give back more than I get, but I somehow doubt it! Guaranteed, I'll try! Thanks! HH Ps... I know I'm gonna hear about this thread, but go ahead and take yer shots... WAYNE!LOL
You ol sap ya.  Your one on here that I have been wanting to meet up with.Someday Im sure.
You forgot to say you wanted to hug a mod  G
Joe, every time I have met up with you it has been a pleasure.  You are part of what makes OFC so great.  I think we need a group hug for sure     Mods included  Joey
Do you shrink heads after you've seized them?

! Brian, I look forward to the day! Gerritt... well I've been fortunate enough to have met Roy twice and TJ and Monique once, a couple of years ago at the fishing show. I'd hug Roy but I think I'd miss! (I'm 6 ft 3inches) Same goes for TJ! But Monique, well, I just may find a way! LOL Joey... the pleasure has always been mine! Snap... big or small, a little garlic and your all good! HH
Hey... what ya singlin me out fur ?  Did yah need something to hug Joe or what's the problem bud?
You're a CLASS act Joe and one of the foundations of what makes this place so great.
The seeds you sow today are the crops you reap tomorrow. From what I have seen from you so far you are in for one beautiful garden!
Sorry I couldn't help you out with your plumbing problem Joe. But I would have if I could be there. Works both ways Joe. It's a community because of fellows (and gals) like you.
